name: Koopa's Basic In Koopaing And Sheling Mod
name_original: Koopa's Basic In Koopaing And Sheling Mod
description:
This is my 2nd Baldi's Basics Classic mod called,Koopa's Basic In Koopaing And Sheling. This is a  mod! I hope you enjoy the mod! :)  Credit to mystman12 for the original Baldi's Basics  Download the original game here: https://mystman12.itch.io/baldis-basics  Follow mystman12 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/mystman12?lang=en  -------------------------------------------------------------  Characters:

Koopa As Baldi

Kharon As the Principal of the Thing

Goomba As  1st Prize

Koopa Spinel As Playtime

Dark Koopa As It'a A Bully

Toy Bonnie As  Arts and Crafters

Toy Freddy  as filename2
